name: Geometry and Color
description:
This is more of an exploration than a game based on a Hickethier cube which is a 3D representation of color

// Click and drag to rotate cube
// Press space while clicking and dragging to change
//   spacing and transparency (x, y axis)
// Press 'm' to make the puzzle move constantly
// Scroll to zoom in
// Type a number and press enter to change the number of cubes,
//   for example: type 15+Enter and you get a 15x15x15 cube
